TopicTitle: The first thing I did in 0.20... (It's not what you think!)

Articles.Content:
Another title I considered for this thread was "If WWI were fought with jets." Anyone else have the same idea? If so, I'd love to see your designs.

Edited May 23, 2013 by nerdboy64
Now put a bunch of these along the runway about 100m out or so so they line the runway

This is why I wanted firespitter before getting the update (I couldn't stand the anxiety and just downloaded lol)

Now we can explore the most detailed planet, Kerbin (which is even better now) from the skies, with less lag (at least for me).

Add firespitter to that and the possibilities are even larger!
My first thing Currently en route to the moon

Close enough. I built a "wright flier" that was powered by jets.

I also soon realized I built it backwards too. And humorously enough, when I cut the engines and just let it tumble around, it eventually leveled out and starting flying backwards too.

I think it's ethical to do unmanned test flights first!

Next stop, Munar Escape Systems.

Second thing i did.

Did not end well.

Tip: Don't land on cliffs

Second thing i did.

Tip: Don't land on cliffs
